of the MIT license (see LICENSE.mit).  Any files without an explicit
license header is under the MIT license.

The files in the xdis/dropbox directory, however, are under the
terms of the GPL-2.0 license (see LICENSE.gpl2).  Due to the terms
of these licenses, the use of the entire project requires complying
with the terms of the GPL-2.0 license.
